dict.string: Check movie scores from Rotten Tomatoes

export LANG=en_GB.UTF-8 IFS=$'\n'
ruby ./rottenmovies.rb "{query}"
details_file="/tmp/rottenmovies"
if [[ -f "${details_file}" ]]; then echo "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" for line in $(cat "${details_file}"); do IFS='⸗' read movie score freshness url <<< "${line}" echo "<item uuid='movie' valid='no' autocomplete='${url}'>" echo "<title>${movie}</title>" echo "<subtitle>${score}</subtitle>" echo "<icon>icons/${freshness}.png</icon>" echo "</item>" done echo "</items>" else echo "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" echo "<item uuid='no_result' valid='no'>" echo "<title>No movies match “{query}”</title>" echo "<subtitle></subtitle>" echo "<icon>icon.png</icon>" echo "</item>" echo "</items>" fi
